Hello, fellow forum user!
Currently, the only problem I truly have with 1.8 is the flashing hearts when you're damaged. I've thoroughly looked through Google to find nothing but a resource pack that claims to be able to do it but also changes the texture of your hearts, XP bar, et cetera. I've fiddled around with my resource pack a bit, and I fixed the flashing regen but am yet to find the source of the flashing hearts and modify it. 
Any information would be extremely appreciated c:
